content: a knit keyhole scarf provides the warmth and coverage of a regular scarf while offering a stylish twist it is a versatile accessory that combines style and practicality note this pattern is available for free on my blog easy comfy and fun to knit turtleneck for men and women **video tutorial ** https //youtu be/wbradlur6vw you are welcome to follow my **youtube** channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucwqwxlyqk9vjedzoiqjw-wa **facebook** https //www facebook com/groups/crazyhands net/ **instagram ** https //www instagram com/amurushka_amur/
